long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of scrolling through countless listings on Vinted, only to find that most of them are located far from you? Our Vinted Location Filter Extension is here to revolutionize the way you browse and shop on Vinted by filtering articles based on your desired location.

Key Features:
Filter by location. Use keywords (example: Portugal) (example: Lisboa).

Location Tagging in the Catalog.

Intuitive User Interface.

How It Works:
Installation: Install the Vinted Location Filter Extension from the Chrome Web Store.

Click the Extension Icon.

Write your location.

Press Filter.

Wait, our extension is fetching each location one by one.

Why Choose Vinted Location Filter Extension?
Save Time: No more endless scrolling through items that don’t meet your location criteria. Quickly find what you’re looking for with targeted filtering.

No need to join the indivual item page to check is location.


Privacy First: Your data privacy is our priority. The extension does not track your activity outside of Vinted or collect personal information.

Download the Vinted Location Filter Extension today and take control of your shopping experience! Experience the convenience of finding the best local deals without the hassle of irrelevant listings.

Feel free to support at buymeacoffee.com/mavc

Any questions, ask!
